value:
The sense of calm I feel here brings
me back to my days at the academy.$k$pBack then, my friends and I made a
vow to one another...

Though Leonster may be small, our
blood is that of Njörun, one of the 12
crusaders.$k$pMy cause would bring no shame to
our line, and my father saw that it
was just, too. And yet...

So restless you are! I have yet to see
you idle. If the castle must be
patrolled, let me take your place.

Being unable to ride into battle on
horseback puts you at a
disadvantage, I'd say.$k$pIf you'd like to learn to ride, I'd be
glad to teach you.

I was just tidying my things—it's
become a habit. If there's a mess,
my wife will let me know about it.$k$pOn that remark, I'd thank you to keep
my confidence.

I am Quan, and I bring greetings from
$Nf.$k$pMay your friendship never falter.

I am the descendant of a crusader.
Strength is my heritage.

I must be vigilant and move ever
forward.

Weakness may be a prelude to
failure, I fear.

On this lance, I swear that I will
exert myself to my utmost on your
behalf.

I am Quan, prince of Leonster. With
me I carry the blood of the crusader
Njörun and her lance, the Gáe Bolg.

Some time has passed since first we
fought together... I am now certain
you possess great skill.$k$pIf you had been there then...$k$pBut no. I have something more
pressing to discuss. What I want to
ask is this: Why do you fight?$k$pHow do you find meaning in battle?
What goal motivates you?$k$pI was met by defeat and lost
everything...$k$pEven so, I still believe my actions will
reverberate into the future.$k$pTruly, I have no idea what effect
those actions will have on the final
outcome...$k$pBut I must hold strong to my will to
fight. The alternative is too terrifying
to contemplate.$k$pAs long as you carry justice in your
heart, I will be by your side, Gáe Bolg
in hand.$k$pLet us move forward without
hesitation, my friend.
はっ！
せいっ！
うああっ！
Damn it...!
You face the Gáe Bolg!
I will not lose.
You'll regret this.
For my allies!
Ethlyn... I'm sorry...
Sigh
My bond of friendship with Sigurd is unbreakable. Now that I have wed Ethlyn, we are brothers!
Our Leonster may be a small country, but it is ruled by the descendants of the crusader Njörun.
Even if I fall into ruin, I will never regret my choice -- as long as I fight for what is right.
When we were just boys studying together, Sigurd, Eldigan, and I shared our dreams for the future.
Have you ever made a mistake? One that haunts you, even now?
As long as I have the Gáe Bolg, I will not lose.
You must not lose your life here. If you were to be placed in danger, I would do everything I could to save you.
Yes.
Ready to go?
My strength.
